```{r}
library(RSQLite)
schema_db <- RSQLite::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), "ECommerce.db")
```

```{r}
# Read data
table_name <- dbListTables(schema_db)
tables <- list()
for (name in table_name){
  tables[[name]] <- dbReadTable(schema_db, name)
}
```

```{r}
category_table <- tables[["category"]]
```
